title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 390th Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 05/28/2019
content: Mayor’s Remarks:1. The second and third reading of the advance payment request is scheduled to be proceeded tomorrow (May 29) by the city council. The heads of bureaus and departments should continue to enhance communication with councilors to make sure our proposals are approved.2. As the 2019 V WBSC U12 Baseball World Cup is starting soon, relevant departments should strengthen the promotion of this grand event. Also, the 2019 Nan-Ying Cup International Junior Championships takes place in Sinying from May 26 to June 2. Departments and bureaus related to international events like these should make sure everything goes well, including the allocation of budget, invitational match, awards and prizes, and sponsorship. These competitions are crucial to the rise of the city government’s visibility. The players, their families, and fans will be drawn to the city, and the number of visitors will grow as well.
